bioconda.name: bioconductor-splicinggraphs
bioconda.summary: Create, manipulate, visualize splicing graphs, and assign RNA-seq reads to them

biotools.summary: This package allows the user to create, manipulate, and visualize splicing graphs and their bubbles based on a gene model for a given organism. Additionally it allows the user to assign RNA-seq reads to the edges of a set of splicing graphs, and to summarize them in different ways.

bioschemas.name: SplicingGraphs
bioschemas.summary: This package allows the user to create, manipulate, and visualize splicing graphs and their bubbles based on a gene model for a given organism. Additionally it allows the user to assign RNA-seq reads to the edges of a set of splicing graphs, and to summarize them in different ways.
